功.definition: meritorious deed or service; achievement; result; service; accomplishment; work (physics)

功到自然成.definition: effort will undoubtedly lead to success (idiom)

功勛.definition: achievement; meritorious deed; contributions (for the good of society)

功名.definition: scholarly honor (in imperial exams); rank; achievement; fame; glory

功名利祿.definition: position and wealth (idiom); rank, fame and fortune

功夫.definition: skill; art; kung fu; labor; effort

功夫流感.definition: Chinese translation of "kung flu", a term used by US President Trump in 2020 to refer to COVID-19 as a "Chinese" disease

功夫茶.definition: very concentrated type of tea drunk in Chaozhou, Fujian and Taiwan

功底.definition: training in the basic skills; knowledge of the fundamentals

功德圓滿.definition: virtuous achievements come to their successful conclusion (idiom)

功德無量.definition: no end of virtuous achievements (idiom); boundless beneficence

功成不居.definition: not to claim personal credit for achievement (idiom)

功放.definition: power amplifier (abbr. for 功率放大器[gong1lu:4 fang4da4qi4])

功敗垂成.definition: to fail within sight of success (idiom); last-minute failure; to fall at the last hurdle; snatching defeat from the jaws of victory

功率輸出.definition: power output (of an electrical device etc)

功能性磁共振成像.pinyin: gōng néng xìng cí gòng zhèn chéng xiàng

功能磁共振成像術.pinyin: gōng néng cí gòng zhèn chéng xiàng shù

功臣.definition: meritorious official; person who renders exceptional service; hero; (fig.) sth that plays a vital role

功莫大焉.definition: no greater contribution has been made than this (idiom)

功虧一簣.definition: lit. to ruin the enterprise for the sake of one basketful; to fail through lack of a final effort; to spoil the ship for a ha'penny worth of tar (idiom)

功課.definition: homework; assignment; task; classwork; lesson; study; CL:門|门[men2]

功過.definition: merits and demerits; contributions and errors

功高不賞.definition: high merit that one can never repay (idiom); invaluable achievements

功高蓋主.definition: lit. one's accomplishments overshadow the authority of the sovereign (idiom); fig. to be so influential that one rivals one's leader
